name: Impulse (Quintkat)
description:
Hi, I'm Quintkat and this is my submission for the Fun Button game jam.

The image below shows you what you would see in-game if you pressed F1 to get a "tutorial"... I didn't have time to make any of that fancy shit haha.

You can also press T to turn off the time restriction mode. For some, just messing around in the game and bouncing off of obstacles might be more fun.

The game is named "Impulse" because the gameplay heavily relies on impulses (mathematical/physical term for an instantaneous force).
